sense.def:
Izraz
whatever
se lahko nanaša na karkoli ali vse primerke določene vrste.

seg.quote: He volunteered to do whatever he could.
She had to rely on whatever books were lying around.

sense.def:
Izraz
whatever
se lahko nanaša tudi na predmete določene vrste, kadar ne moremo natančno opredeliti njihove narave.

seg.quote: Whatever the reason, Rudolph was glad that she had come back.
She gave us a bowl of chilli, whatever that is.
You plug it into a computer or whatever and it does the rest.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
whatever
tudi povemo, da nekaj velja v vseh primerih.

seg.quote: I have to bring my family back whatever happens.

sense.def:
Besedo
whatever
uporabimo za samostalniško skupino, da poudarimo zanikanje neke trditve.

seg.quote: There is no scientific evidence whatever to support such a view.
He knew nothing whatever about it.

sense.def:
Izraz
whatever
uporabljamo v vprašanjih, kadar želimo pokazati, da smo presenečeni.
